description:
[root@xxxxxxx ~]# nova-manage agent create --os linux --architecture x86 --version 1.0 --url <email address hidden> --md5hash 

/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/engine/default.py:331: Warning: Data truncated for column 'md5hash' at row 1
  cursor.execute(statement, parameters)
title: nova-manage agent create should do param check
